name: jerome-rdlv/webp-images
description: Add a cron job that creates WebP versions of all uploaded images

post-update-cmd: test -x cwebp && exit 0; wget -c https://storage.googleapis.com/downloads.webmproject.org/releases/webp/libwebp-1.1.0-linux-x86-64.tar.gz -O - | tar -zxOvf - libwebp-1.1.0-linux-x86-64/bin/cwebp > cwebp; chmod +x cwebp
